rows.label: tlk45320121_05_msg0001
rows.name:
It's precisely because our country is
in a state of crisis that we need to
rally the people of Gula!

rows.label: tlk45320121_05_msg0002
rows.name:
At this rate, we might have to go from
house to house and indiscriminately
make everyone touch Core Crystals!

rows.label: tlk45320121_05_msg0003
rows.name:
...I actually suggested that to the
Bureau of Internal Affairs, you know.

rows.label: tlk45320121_05_msg0004
rows.name:
But they told me no, on grounds that
we'd end up with a pile of citizens
lying in pools of their own blood.

rows.label: tlk45320121_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Which is...a fair point. But seeing the
state the world is in, we can't afford to
have people sitting doing nothing!
